articles.author: Tanya Gold
articles.title: Where populists rush in: How George Galloway harnessed the Middle East to derail an election in forgotten Rochdale - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Victory for pro-Palestinian firebrand follows the ugliest by-election campaign in living memory.
articles.content: Galloway ran his campaign from a Suzuki car dealership, which is both darkly funny, and a metaphor for the way in which democracy can feel like another glib consumer choice. Do you want a car and a d… [+2008 chars]

articles.author: Stuart Lau
articles.title: Putin's bluffing on nukes (for now), says top NATO official - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “We do not see any imminent threat of Russia using these weapons,” said military alliance’s deputy secretary-general.
articles.content: He added, "We do not see any imminent threat of Russia using these weapons. But these statements are in themselves very dangerous, because they erode trust. Russia knows the consequences of taking su… [+764 chars]
